summary.span: 取得目前已驗證的 XML 項目或屬性，做為最適當 Microsoft .NET Framework 型別的 Boxed 物件 (根據其結構描述型別)。

span.span: Gets the current validated XML element or attribute as a boxed object of the most appropriate Microsoft .NET Framework type according to its schema type.

value.span: 目前已驗證的 XML 項目或屬性，做為最適當 .NET Framework 型別的 Boxed 物件。

span.span: The current validated XML element or attribute as a boxed object of the most appropriate .NET Framework type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果項目的值無效，無法根據指定的結構描述類型，值屬性就相當於 windows 7屬性。If the value of the item is not valid according to its specified schema type, the value of the property is equivalent to the value of the property. 如需有關型別支援命名空間，請參閱 < [System.Xml 類別中的型別支援](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md)。For more information about type support in the namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public override object ValueAs (Type type, System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver nsResolver);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance object ValueAs(class System.Type type, class System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver nsResolver) cil managed
public: override System::Object ^ ValueAs(Type ^ type, System::Xml::IXmlNamespaceResolver ^ nsResolver);

param.name: type
param.span: 傳回已驗證之 XML 項目或屬性值所使用的型別。

span.span: The type to return the validated XML element or attribute's value as.

param.name: nsResolver
param.span: 物件，用於解析命名空間前置詞。

span.span: The object used to resolve namespace prefixes.

summary.span: 使用為解析命名空間前置詞而指定的 物件，以指定的型別形式傳回已驗證之 XML 項目或屬性的值。

span.span: Returns the validated XML element or attribute's value as the type specified using the object specified to resolve namespace prefixes.

returns.span: 型別所要求之已驗證 XML 項目或屬性的值。

span.span: The value of the validated XML element or attribute as the type requested.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會嘗試將已驗證的 XML 項目或屬性的值轉換成指定的 Microsoft.NET Framework 型別。The method attempts to convert the value of the validated XML element or attribute to the Microsoft .NET Framework type specified. 物件用來解析命名空間前置詞與類型轉換。The object is used to resolve namespace prefixes related to type conversions. 例如，當轉換`xs:QName`至`xs:string`。For example, when converting an `xs:QName` to an `xs:string`. 如需有關型別支援命名空間，請參閱 < [System.Xml 類別中的型別支援](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md)。For more information about type support in the namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).

exception.span: 已驗證之 XML 項目或屬性的值不是目標型別的正確格式。

span.span: The validated XML element or attribute's value is not in the correct format for the target type.
The attempted cast is not valid.
The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property ValueAsBoolean As Boolean
public: virtual property bool ValueAsBoolean { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得 形式之已驗證的 XML 項目或屬性值。

span.span: Gets the validated XML element or attribute's value as a .

value.span: 形式之已驗證的 XML 項目或屬性值。

span.span: The validated XML element or attribute's value as a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會嘗試將已驗證的 XML 項目或屬性的值轉換成 Microsoft.NET Framework根據 XPath 2.0 規則的項目類型轉換的型別。The property attempts to convert the value of the validated XML element or attribute to the Microsoft .NET Framework type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type. 如需有關型別支援命名空間，請參閱 < [System.Xml 類別中的型別支援](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md)。For more information about type support in the namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).

exception.span: 已驗證之 XML 項目或屬性的值不是 型別的正確格式。

span.span: The validated XML element or attribute's value is not in the correct format for the type.
The attempted cast to is not valid.

span.span: The .NET Framework type of the validated XML element or attribute.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會取得已驗證的 XML 項目或屬性的具類型值的.NET Framework 型別。The property gets the .NET Framework type of the typed value of the validated XML element or attribute. 例如，類型的元素`xs:int`會有的預設。For example, an element of type `xs:int` would have a of by default. 不過，可能是任何一個可以對應到有效型別`xs:int`，例如或。However, the could be any one of the valid types that can be mapped to `xs:int`, such as or . 如需有關型別支援命名空間，請參閱 < [System.Xml 類別中的型別支援](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md)。For more information about type support in the namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).
